entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain then changing to periods of rain near noon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
